step.title: Continuted development
step.text: Integration with SLSA and package repositories like npm, developing per-ecosystem Sigstore clients

step.title: Cosign 2.0 released
step.text: Leveraging identity-based signing by default, building on GA release

step.title: General Availability for Public Good Instance
step.text: Fulcio and Rekor, hosted by the Sigstore community, offer a 99.5% uptime SLO and 24/7 pager support

step.title: Fulcio and Rekor 1.0 released
step.text: Feature complete, stable APIs and commitment to long term support

step.title: Cosign 1.0 released
step.text: Includes hardware support for Yubico PIV devices, cloud KMS, SPDX and Cyclone DX SBOMs, #wasm
